description:

It was good that he took me up on the offer. He’s a little older now, but he's still as energetic as he was when he first showed up. He says that he really likes Latin guys but I also knew that he would really like Chris!

It didn’t matter that we were on the way to the studio... Chris started sucking on Gabe’s cock right then and there. They had a very playful energy and I let them go at it. Gabe really fucked Chris with some intensity. By the time they were done, Chris’ chest was sprayed down with tons of cum!
title: Gabe & Chris
